thread.title: 'Wheel of Fortune' Contestant Flubs 'Streetcar Named Desire' Puzzle With Just One Letter Missing
thread.title_full: 'Wheel of Fortune' Contestant Flubs 'Streetcar Named Desire' Puzzle With Just One Letter Missing

title: 'Wheel of Fortune' Contestant Flubs 'Streetcar Named Desire' Puzzle With Just One Letter Missing
text:
Is This the Most Incredible Wheel of Fortune Guess Ever? Kevin was a good sport about the gaffe, but Wheel viewers were not so forgiving on social media. "This guy on wheel of fortune just guessed 'A Streetcar Naked Desire' I'm so done," one Twitter user wrote. Another added, "Dude on Wheel of Fortune had to solve this: A STREETCAR NA_ED DESIRE He asked for a K. I'm gonna go lie down." Talk Show Controversies and Feuds: The Biggest Ever 
And while Kevin's response was a huge fail, it wasn't nearly as embarrassing as April 2014 contestant Julian Batts' flub . The Indiana University student had every letter on the board revealed â€” "Mythological Hero Achilles" â€” but mispronounced the name "Achilles," causing him to lose all of his money, his $1 million wedge and a trip to London. This guy on wheel of fortune just guessed "A Streetcar Naked Desire" I'm so done pic.twitter.com/ZsYdc3BmAA â€” Emily Weiss (@emily_weiss28) March 21, 2017 Dude on Wheel of Fortune had to solve this:A STREETCAR NA_ED DESIREHe asked for a K.Iâ€™m gonna go lie down. â€” David Aldridge (@daldridgetnt) March 21, 2017 Feeling for "Streetcar Naked Desire" guy tonight on @WheelofFortune . Unlike Jeopardy itâ€™s literally spelled out for you https://t.co/e2rVTzsGTO â€” J.A. Adande (@jadande) March 22, 2017 A guy missed this on Wheel of Fortune: A Streetcar Na_ed Desire. He said it was A Streetcar Naked Desire pic.twitter.com/0MI8D4OSlY â€” Yankee Man (@MyBoyJeter) March 22, 2017 I signed up for twitter bc the guy on @WheelofFortune said K for "A STREETCAR NA_ED DESIRE" and I laughed so hard I HAD to tell someone. ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚
